mapper.sql: need_vrsn_nbr, expt_seq_nbr, data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, data_interface_name, data_interface_desc, data_load_freq, data_load_mthd, filed_delim, line_delim, extrnl_database_name, intrnl_database_name, extrnl_table_name, intrnl_table_name, table_type, bucket_number, s_date, e_date
mapper.insert: insert into data_interface_history (need_vrsn_nbr, expt_seq_nbr, data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, data_interface_name, data_interface_desc, data_load_freq, data_load_mthd, filed_delim, line_delim, extrnl_database_name, intrnl_database_name, extrnl_table_name, intrnl_table_name, table_type, bucket_number, s_date, e_date ) values (#{needVrsnNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exptSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE} )

insert into data_interface_history
need_vrsn_nbr,
expt_seq_nbr,
data_src_abbr,
data_interface_no,
data_interface_name,
data_interface_desc,
data_load_freq,
data_load_mthd,
filed_delim,
line_delim,
extrnl_database_name,
intrnl_database_name,
extrnl_table_name,
intrnl_table_name,
table_type,
bucket_number,
s_date,
e_date,
#{needVrsnNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{exptSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{eDate,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update data_interface_history
data_interface_desc = #{dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_load_freq = #{dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_load_mthd = #{dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed_delim = #{filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_delim = #{lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extrnl_database_name = #{extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intrnl_database_name = #{intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extrnl_table_name = #{extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intrnl_table_name = #{intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_type = #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bucket_number = #{bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
s_date = #{sDate,jdbcType=DATE},
e_date = #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where need_vrsn_nbr = #{needVrsnNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and expt_seq_nbr = #{exptSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_src_abbr = #{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_interface_no = #{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_interface_name = #{dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select '3' as flag,'-' as red, b.proc_name, a.data_src_abbr,a.data_interface_no,a.data_interface_name,a.data_interface_desc,a.data_load_freq,a.data_load_mthd,a.filed_delim,a.line_delim,a.extrnl_database_name,a.intrnl_database_name,a.extrnl_table_name,a.intrnl_table_name,a.table_type,a.bucket_number from data_interface_tmp a left join data_interface2proc_tmp b on a.data_src_abbr = b.data_src_abbr and a.data_interface_no = b.data_interface_no and a.e_date=b.e_date and a.batch_no= b.batch_no where a.e_date='3000-12-31' and a.batch_no=#{exptSeqNbr} and a.data_src_abbr =#{dataSrcAbbr}
